snippet: The American national team goalkeeper Hope Solo received a public warning from the United States Anti-Doping Agency after she tested positive for a banned substance.
abstract: American Olympic team goalkeeper Hope Solo receives a public warning from the United States Anti-Doping Agency after testing positive for a banned substance, but will still compete in the London Games.
lead_paragraph: The American national team goalkeeper Hope Solo received a public warning from the United States Anti-Doping Agency after she tested positive for a banned substance.
